title: A modular pipeline for natural language processing-screened human abstraction of a pragmatic trial outcome from electronic health records
details: RY Lee, KS Li, J Sibley, T Cohen, WB Lober, J O'Brien… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: Background: Natural language processing (NLP) allows efficient extraction of clinical variables and outcomes from electronic health records (EHR). However, measuring pragmatic clinical trial outcomes may demand accuracy that exceeds NLP …
